language-modification: Translations have been made using Google Translate tools. If you notice any errors or inconsistencies, please let us know.

licence-status.not-activated: This license is not yet active
licence-status.already-used: This license has already been used

shop.title: Buy your games at the best price
shop.description: Our selection includes more than 200 discounted games with unlimited access to our offline accounts. You can also enjoy the latest releases as soon as they launch.

licence-activation.licence-duration: This license is valid for {days} days after activation
licence-activation.number-games: This license gives access to {nbGames} game | This license gives access to {nbGames} games
licence-activation.input-licence-to-access: Enter your activation license to access your games
licence-activation.would-like-activate-licence-key: Would you like to activate this license?

game-list.no-game-found-with-filters: No games match your search criteria. Try adjusting your filters or searching for a different title.

game-login.account-details-informations: Here are the details for your {platform} account for {gameName}. Please keep them confidential.

cart.title: Cart
cart.empty-message: It seems you haven't added any games to your cart yet. Browse our catalog to find your next favorite game!

licence.cant-apply: This license is invalid or cannot be applied
licence.licence-existing-message: If you already have a license key, you can enter it here to add these games to your existing license.
licence.games-applied-to-existing-licence: The games in your cart will be applied to the license
licence.games-not-applied-if-already-in-licence: Note: Games already present on your license will not be added again.

cart-item.disabled-by-owning: This license already includes this game

checkout.keep-link: You can return to this page later if needed by saving the URL

failed.title: Order Failed
failed.message: We couldn't process your order, no charges have been made. Please check your information and try again.

success.title: Order Confirmed
success.message: Thank you for your purchase. Here are the details of your order:
success.mail-sent: A confirmation email has been sent to {mail}
success.add-games-to-existing-licence: Add games to an existing license
success.products: Products: {count} games | Products: {count} game | Products: {count} games

prepare.title: Preparing your order
prepare.message: We are redirecting you to the payment page...
prepare.message-wait: We are redirecting you to the subscription management page...

error.title: Order not found
error.message: We couldn't find the order you are looking for. This may be due to one of the following reasons:
error.old-order: The order is too old and no longer in our system
error.contact: If you believe this is an error, please don't hesitate to contact us.

not-found.title: Oops! The page you're looking for isn't here.
not-found.message: The address might be incorrect or the page has been moved.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.name: Name
contact.your-licence-key: Your license key if you have one
contact.missing-fields: Please fill in all required fields
contact.mail-sended: Your message has been sent, we will get back to you as soon as possible
contact.mail-send-error: An error occurred, please try again later
contact.discord-support:
Support on Discord:
Generally faster, variable availability
contact.discord-message: Join our active community on Discord to discuss, share, and get faster assistance!
contact.discord-description: Our Discord server offers faster support than email. Feel free to join us for any questions or assistance!

game-details.denuvo-limitation-description-1: This game uses Denuvo protection that limits activations to 5 new devices per day.
game-details.denuvo-limitation-description-2: Immediate access to the game is not guaranteed. A wait time of 24 to 48 hours may apply.
game-details.need-help-title: Need help? Join our Discord server!
game-details.need-help-description: If you have questions or encounter problems, our team is available to assist on our Discord server. Click the button below to join our community.

game-details-details.error-media-loading: An error occurred while retrieving game images, please try again later.
game-details-details.immediate-access-description: You will receive access credentials to the account immediately after completing your purchase. No wait time.
game-details-details.self-activation-description: You can activate the account anytime, 24/7, without requiring our intervention.
game-details-details.secure-download-description: Download the game directly from our {platform} account, without resorting to torrents or unsecured third-party sites.
game-details-details.years-warranty-description: 2-year access guarantee. In case of access or connection issues, we will resolve the problem or provide a replacement account for free.
game-details-details.updates-included-description: Enjoy the latest game updates available on {platform}.
game-details-details.secure-payments-description: We offer secure payment methods via Stripe and Paypal, ensuring a protected transaction.
game-details-details.account-offline-description: This product provides access to a {platform} account in offline mode. It is designed for single-player mode only, without online features.
game-details-details.no-activation-key-description: This is not a game key but a shared account. You are not purchasing an individual game license.
game-details-details.account-not-transferable-description: This account is shared and cannot be linked or transferred to your personal {platform} account.
game-details-details.cloud-gaming-incompatible-description: It is not possible to play this game via cloud gaming services such as PlayKey, Geforce Now, Google Stadia, Loudplay, Drova, etc.
game-details-details.modifications-not-allowed-description: It is strictly forbidden to modify account information (email address, password, etc.). Any modification attempt may result in deactivation of your access.
game-details-details.shared-account-description: This account is shared with other users. You must not attempt to take control of it or make changes.

game-details-instructions.receive-activation-key-description: Once your purchase is complete, you will receive an activation key.
game-details-instructions.activate-key-description: You can then activate the activation key on our website to access the game you purchased.
game-details-instructions.retrieve-connection-data-description: Select the game you want to play and retrieve the username and password associated with the account.
game-details-instructions.install-launcher-description: Download the launcher for the {platform} (if not already installed).
game-details-instructions.login-to-account-description: Log in using the provided credentials.
game-details-instructions.download-game-description: Download the game to your computer.
game-details-instructions.first-launch-online-description: Launch the game online for the first time.
game-details-instructions.pass-to-offline-description: Close the game, switch to offline mode.
game-details-instructions.play-offline-description: You can now play the game in offline mode.

game-list.title: Or buy your games individually
game-list.description: Choose and buy the games you want.
game-list.error: An error occurred while retrieving the game list, please try again later.

game-pack.title: Access our entire catalog
game-pack.description: Get complete access to our game catalog and play new titles as they are released
game-pack.denuvo-message: (Excluding Denuvo games - Added a few weeks later)
game-pack.licence-month-description: Access our entire game catalog on a monthly renewal cycle.
game-pack.licence-year-description: Access our entire game catalog on a yearly renewal cycle.

subscription-details.title: Subscription Description
subscription-details.description-1: Access our complete catalog of over 200 PC games in offline mode. From the latest releases to timeless classics, discover a diverse collection updated regularly.
subscription-details.description-2: Enjoy new games added every month and play unlimited as long as your subscription is active.
subscription-details.immediate-access-description: You will receive the subscription access license immediately after completing your purchase. No waiting time.
subscription-details.frequent-additions-description: During your subscription period, you will have access to all newly added games.
subscription-details.self-activation-description: You can activate the account anytime, 24/7, without requiring our intervention.
subscription-details.secure-download-description: Download the game directly from our Steam account without resorting to torrents or unsecured third-party sites.
subscription-details.warranty-description: Access guarantee throughout your subscription period. In case of access or connection issues with a game, we will provide a replacement account for free.
subscription-details.updates-included-description: Enjoy the latest updates available for the game.
subscription-details.secure-payments-description: We offer secure payment methods via Stripe and PayPal, ensuring a protected transaction.

subscription-plan.reset-at-any-time: * Cancelable at any time, your subscription will end at the next renewal date.

subscription.title: RK Game Pass Subscription
subscription.secure-payments: Secure payment with Stripe or PayPal
subscription.access-to-future-games: Access to all future new games

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.contact-us: Contact us by email or join our active community on Discord to discuss, share, and get faster assistance!

faq-set-ubisoft-offline.title: How to switch Ubisoft to offline mode?
faq-set-ubisoft-offline.description: Here's how to switch Ubisoft Connect to offline mode by blocking its connection in the Windows firewall.

method-1.title: Method 1: Use Ubisoft Offline Locker (Easy & Fast)
method-1.one-click: One-click block/unblock for Ubisoft Connect in Windows Firewall.
method-1.save-settings: Saves your settings for quick access.

method-2.title: Method 2: Manually Block via Windows Firewall (No software needed)
method-2.description: If you prefer a manual setup, follow this step-by-step tutorial to block "UplayWebCore.exe" directly in your firewall settings.

method-3.title: Method 3: Unplug
method-3.description: The simplest method is to unplug your Internet cable or disable Wi-Fi to go offline.

locked.title: Access Temporarily Blocked
locked.description: For account security, your access has been temporarily blocked due to too many requests.
locked.information: For security reasons, you must wait before requesting credentials again.

error.title: Access Blocked
error.description: It seems an error occurred while validating your license.
